name: Escape From Earth (itch) (Big Hammer Games)
description:
Escape From Earth is a zombie survival game where you survive a horde of zombies earn money to buy more weapons and powerful equipment.  #Survival #Zombie #Shooter #Singleplayer

Game Controls:

WASD to move around

left click to fire the gun

hold Shift to run

hold Ctrl to crouch

Space Bar to jump

Press Esc to pause the game

Upcoming Features:

Guns - AK-47, Scar-H, M16, M4A1, and more!

Different kind of zombies

Mini-Boss Zombies

Currency

Points System

Score System

Multiplayer
